Text:
Yeah. 
This movie is dubbed in russian, and the "readme" file instructions for how to play the original french audio are complete bullshit.
It doesn't work.
So, either learn russian, or download another file.

instructions for french audio track is in the description:

Instructions to select original french Audio track using VLC media player:
Media > Advanced Open File
Add.. select video file (.mkv extension)
Show more options (check)
Play another media synchronously
Browse
Add.. select audio track (.mp4 extension)
Select
Play

Thanks Kuka

Amazing what a difference it makes when one reads the instructions (not that used to VLC yet myself)... works like a charm

A-10
V-10

@luke: The instructions does work, no problem at all, you must be doing it wrong...

V: 10/10 A: 10/10
